user_prompt: create epics and user stories for the use case

epics.title: Project Setup and Infrastructure Configuration
epics.summary: Establish development infrastructure and foundational setup
epics.description: Initiate the project by creating repositories, configuring build tools, selecting technologies, and setting up continuous integration and deployment pipelines. Prepare cloud environments and define version control strategies. This ensures a stable base for further development across all modules and teams.

epics.title: User Authentication and Role Management
epics.summary: Develop secure login, registration, and role-based access control
epics.description: Implement authentication mechanisms including registration, login, logout, and password recovery. Configure encrypted password storage and role-based access management to safeguard sensitive application areas. Integrate external authentication providers (e.g., OAuth, SSO) for seamless onboarding.

epics.title: Core Feature Implementation
epics.summary: Develop main functional modules based on business requirements
epics.description: Create the central modules that represent the primary functionality of the system. Define entities, design workflows, and implement CRUD operations and analytics logic. Integrate with APIs and data storage layers to ensure performance, scalability, and reliability in handling real-time application use cases.

epics.title: Frontend UI/UX Development
epics.summary: Design and build a seamless, user-friendly interface
epics.description: Develop the frontend interface using modern libraries and frameworks to enhance usability and engagement. Focus on accessibility, responsiveness, and performance across devices. Implement consistent component design, intuitive navigation, and responsive layouts adhering to brand and accessibility guidelines.

epics.title: Integrations, Notifications, and Reports
epics.summary: Enable third-party system integrations and advanced features
epics.description: Integrate with external systems such as payment gateways, email and SMS services, and analytics platforms. Implement in-app or push notifications and reporting tools to analyze user activity and system performance. Ensure secure API interactions and compliance with data exchange standards.

epics.title: Quality Assurance, Deployment, and Maintenance
epics.summary: Test system functionality and manage production release
epics.description: Execute unit, integration, and acceptance testing to validate software reliability. Optimize system performance and fix critical issues. Deploy the solution to staging and production environments with automated pipelines. Post-deployment, establish application monitoring, error tracking, and routine maintenance activities.

user_stories.title: Create repositories
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to create repositories, so that I can organize and manage code efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Repositories should follow project naming conventions and include initial README and LICENSE files.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Repositories are created with proper naming and initial content.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a project name, When I create a repository, Then it should follow naming conventions and have initial files.

user_stories.title: Configure build tools
user_stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to configure build tools, so that I can automate the build process.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Build tools must support automation, logging, and integration with CI/CD pipelines.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Build tools are configured and integrated with the CI/CD pipeline.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the build tool configuration, When I run the build, Then it should complete successfully and log the process.

user_stories.title: Implement user registration
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to register, so that I can create an account to access the application.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The registration process should include validation and storage of user details.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can register with validated details and receive confirmation.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user details, When I register, Then I should receive a confirmation email.

user_stories.title: Implement user login
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to log in, so that I can access my account securely.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Login must support username/password and external providers (OAuth, SSO).
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can log in with their credentials or via external providers.
user_stories.test_cases: Given valid credentials, When I log in, Then I should access my account.

user_stories.title: Develop core entities
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to define core entities, so that the application has a structured data model.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Entities should follow the data model design and support CRUD operations.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Core entities are defined and functional.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an entity model, When I perform CRUD operations, Then all should succeed.

user_stories.title: Implement business workflows
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to design workflows, so that business processes are correctly modeled.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflows should map to business requirements and support critical processes.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Workflows are functional and meet business process requirements.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a workflow, When executed, Then it should complete as expected.

user_stories.title: Develop a responsive UI
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a responsive UI, so that I have a seamless experience across devices.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The UI should adjust to different screen sizes and orientations.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: UI is responsive and user-friendly on all devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given different devices, When I navigate the UI, Then the layout should adjust seamlessly.

user_stories.title: Implement intuitive navigation
user_stories.description: As a user, I want intuitive navigation, so that I can find information quickly and easily.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Navigation should be clear and follow usability standards.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Navigation is intuitive and users can find content easily.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the navigation menu, When I search for content, Then I should find it easily.

user_stories.title: Integrate payment gateways
user_stories.description: As a user, I want secure payment integrations, so that I can complete transactions safely.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Payment integration should support multiple gateways and comply with security standards.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Payment gateways are integrated and transactions are secure.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a payment gateway, When I complete a transaction, Then it should be processed securely.

user_stories.title: Implement push notifications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to receive push notifications, so that I stay informed about updates.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Notifications should be configurable and timely.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Push notifications are sent and received as per user settings.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user preferences, When there is an update, Then a push notification should be sent.

user_stories.title: Perform unit testing
user_stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want to execute unit tests, so that individual components are verified.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Unit tests should cover all critical components and edge cases.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Unit tests are executed and pass successfully.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a component, When I run unit tests, Then they should pass.

user_stories.title: Deploy application
user_stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to deploy the application, so that it is available in the production environment.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Deployment should be automated, reliable, and rollback-capable.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Application is deployed and functioning in the production environment.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a deployment pipeline, When I deploy the application, Then it should be successful and functional.
